Desc.entry: Assembly of God Pentecostal Church, offering lively, fresh, young and dynamic worship. Runs mens' project and ladies' project. Also runs parent and toddler groups and youth and childrens' projects with holiday clubs during the summer and easter holidays. Has a creative arts team and works in local schools. Runs lunchtime club at Stocksbridge High School.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Tues-Fri 9am-4.30pm (office times); Sunday Service at 10.30am, Mon & Tues 10-11.30am (parent and toddler group), Tues at 8pm (Small Group Network), Fri 6-7pm (Big - children's club for children aged 5-11 years), 7.30-9pm (The Lounge - club for children aged 11-16 years), last Sun in the month at 6pm (The Event)
